name: Six Inches
description: Six-inch leg raise exercises, also called leg-lift exercises, are a good way of toning the lower abdomincal muscles. They can also tone the calves and the thighs, and help you with balance and felxibility. They are called six-inch leg raise exercises because, if done properly, you should aim to lift your legs six inches from the floor.
focuses: Begin lying flat on your back on the floor or on an exercise mat
Fully extend your body so your legs are straight and your arms rest at your sides with your palms flat on the ground
With your feet and legs together, lift your legs at the hip until they are 6 inches off the ground
Hold this position for two or three counts
Return to the starting position and repeat
